to use about a tablespoon of ground

course now we want to add some heat and

now if you've never had me barbecue

you might want to try this

all right now even though there's some

this sauce sweeten up a little bit more
and then want to add some salt here
we're using a cooking salt about an

less and more it's up to you give it a
